Name: Café Ons
Review Text: It's an amazing little Café/Diner/Feel-Good-Area. The food is amazing (really not small) and the ladies there are super nice. You don't have to wait long, but even if, you'll enjoy the good atmosphere. It's made with a lot of love. I can …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Lovely cafe for a bit of rest. Started with coffee, then had a beer with bitterballen. I visited in winter, slightly before Christmas, and it was a cozy atmosphere with Christmassy decorations. Very friendly staff too.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Place looked nice. But sadly the coffee was lukewarm and plate and spoon (see picture) where dirty. After asking for a warm coffee, they just put it in the microwave and returned it with the same dirty plate.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: The food was very nice, nothing outstanding - the service could have been a bit better - they didn‘t let us know that the kitchen closed at 9 so they wouldnt take our order at 9:02 - they changed their mind afterwards so in general the experience was okay.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: A hidden gem! The server was so friendly, the beer was refreshing, beef bitterballen tasty and satisfying, and the atmosphere fun and comfortable.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Only popped in for a quick beer, stayed a few hours. Lovely people, very friendly atmosphere. Absolutely fantastic

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: The food was good but my wife and I left feeling angry. After sitting there for one hour and ordering 2 hamburgers, fries, coffees and a beer, the owner asked us to leave (before we finished our coffee) because she wanted to "make more money on other guests". Extremely rude, we will not go there again.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: We visited this place because we were starving and ready to eat anything. Boy were we happy with what we got. The food was amazing and the service was good. The place has good vegetarian options, a wide variety of snacks and a good …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Loved it! Gorgeous little place in Amsterdam Noord. They have a very nice and cosy terrace with an open fire and blankets, and in some tables there are even hammocks!!. The personnel is incredibly friendly and the food is super fresh. …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Beautiful place. You can find many kind of Frisky and Frisky people too. As they say, the chef is a cat but don't worry.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text:
The oldest bar of Amsterdam Noord!
Nice food, nice atmosphere decent prices. Once the service wasn't very friendly but now they improved a lot! …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: I'm in love with this place! The prices are fair, the staff is friendly and the atmosphere really great. P.S.: There's a really cute cat around.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Very friendly restaurant, very beautiful setting a bit expensive for the quantity but the dish was good ......... On the other hand we were really surprised, not to say shocked at the lack of tolerance towards children. Indeed we were with …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Possibly our favourite find in all of Amsterdam. Cute bar just across the river (Noord side). Great service and drinks, but the best bit is the cosy atmosphere outside in the garden area that has a roaring fire and blankets. Have been back several times! Try the mulled wine too, so good.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Enjoyed a delicious lunch at Cafe Ons on our last day in Amsterdam. The food was of high quality and delicious. The service was friendly and attentive. I would highly recommend

Name: Café Ons

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Very tasty burger. The ONS burger is great. A small cafe/restaurant with a very quick kitchen.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere and nice service but what made me love it even more was the food! Amazing and for a very nice deal!!! Try their apple cake! It’s divine!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: The best apple pie that I've ever ate!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Horrible rude and angry staff, 25 minutes to order a beer and when I complained the  barman started to shout at me. As we say in horeca if you can't handle the heat get out the kitchen... Nice place shame about the service

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Great food and friendly staff. Cool cosy vibe inside with chilled music

Name: Café Ons

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Very good food at decent prices to be enjoyed in a relaxed, urban atmosphere. Dutch appeltaart is recommended!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Not fancy, but very-very  nice place. Tasty ribs and chicken, local draft beer. Terrace  for smokers.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Best french toast ever, really cozy place!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Since june 2017 a new owner who really made it a cosy terrace. Service with a smile and a good lunch menu!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Had a tasty hamburger and an apple pie, home made and very tasty as well. They put an effort into the food, also the atmosphere is relaxed and with taste. Definitely recommended for brunch, lunch, or just coffee and cake.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Cozy café in Amsterdam Noord near attractions like the EYE Film Instituut. Nice menu, friendly staff and good service .

Name: Café Ons
Review Text:
Lovely and cozy place with delicious food and friendly staff.
Easy to reach on foot in 5 minutes from Amsterdam Central station with the free ferry service. Highly recommended to enjoy your meal in a relaxing atmosphere while avoiding the mass of tourists in the city center.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Awesome atmosphere, Very good food. Our waitress must have been having a bad day. Service was horrible. She totally ignored us from the beginning. Besides that. Still like the place.

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: The best burgers I've had! On a delicious bun:) just a min away from the ferry, so perfect spot to get away from the busy center. And the service was great as well!

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Perfect relaxing moment for lunch on the nice terrasse. The soups are of epic quality, served with bread and butter; the hummus toast and fried vegetables are a delight for the senses. To end this wonderful experience, try a dessert. The …

Review Text: This is an excellent place situated in Amsterdam Noord (easy to reach with the ferry, you take it behind Central Station and once you are there its gonna be 5 minutes walk - or less -). The atmosphere there makes you want to stay for ever, …

Name: Café Ons
Review Text: Cozy neighborhood pub with excellent food at reasonable prices. Friendly, efficient staff. Situated in an old village house, and said to be the oldest eatery in Amsterdam-Noord. Well worth the (free) ferry trip across the river IJ, and the 5 minute walk.
